messages.subject: Activity day in Ohio
messages.msgSnippet: Hi Andi (and other Ohioans)! Andi, it would be great if you and Issac can come to the inventure place on the 23rd!!!!  I think we are meeting there at 11:00
messages.messageBody:
Hi Andi (and other Ohioans)!

Andi, it would be great if you and Issac can come to the inventure place on
the 23rd!!!! I think we are meeting there at 11:00 Am, but I will confirm it
with you later.

Also, i am having an Activity day at my house on Friday, June 25th at 1:00
PM. No particular thing is scheduled, but we have a 42" deep pool, much arts
& crafts stuff, and 14 acres of woods behind us, oh, and a cool tree house.
This is just a chance for homeschoolers to get together and play for the
afternoon!

This would be a great time for you and Issac to visit Andi! All of you Ohio
hs'ers are invited too! Or anyone who might be passing through on that day
:-)

Please reply to me personally and let me know if you are interested in coming
and need directions! Again, I am in North Ridgeville, which is in Lorain
County (next to Cuyahoga County).

Kim (applekjf@...)
